metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6290

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Development Tools 15
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15

metadata.Description: An infinite recursion issue was discovered in eval.c in Netwide Assembler (NASM) through 2.14.02. There is a stack exhaustion problem resulting from infinite recursion in the functions expr, rexp, bexpr and cexpr in certain scenarios involving lots of '{' characters. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted asm file.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 15 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Development Tools 15 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 15 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 is installed
